error.applet_not_supported:
Applet Mode を対応していません。

Title Override 機能で起動してください。
(　キーを押しながら任意のゲームを起動する)

about.title: 情報
about.about: Moonlight-Switch is a third-party game streaming client based on Moonlight-Common-C for the Nintendo Switch
about.thanks_1:  Rock88 and his Moonlight-NX, lots of code was reused in this app
about.thanks_3:  Moonlight team, it could not be possible without them
about.thanks_4:  Cameron Gutman for helping to solve an issue with LibNX
